Dugaan Pelanggaran Etika, Badan Kehormatan Panggil William PSI
05 Nov 2019, 10:18 by Imam Hamdi, Martha Warta Silaban
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Badan Kehormatan DPRD DKI Jakarta menyatakan bakal memanggil anggota Fraksi PSI DKI William Aditya Sarana atau William PSI untuk menindaklanjuti laporan warga terkait adanya pelanggaran etika yang dilakukan legislator termuda itu.
"Kami sudah menggelar rapat dengan anggota, keputusannya nanti kami mengundang William," kata Ketua Badan Kehormatan atau BK DPRD DKI, Achmad Nawawi, Selasa, 5 November 2019.
Warga bernama Sugiyanto melaporkan William ke BK DPRD kemarin. Ketua Umum Lembaga Swadaya Masyarakat Maju Kotanya Bahagia Warganya itu menganggap apa yang dilakukan William melanggar Peraturan DPRD DKI Jakarta Nomor 1 tahun 2014 tentang Tata Tertib DPRD DKI Jakarta.
Sugiyanto, menilai pelanggaran tampak dari cara William mengunggah usulan anggaran DKI yang janggal melalui media sosial. William mengunggah anggaran janggal APBD DKI seperti pembelian lem aibon yang mencapai Rp 82 miliar di Suku Dinas Pendidikan Jakarta Barat.
"Saya melihat bahwa sepertinya dugaan pelanggaran kode etik dalam menyampaikan pendapat. Tidak memperhatikan tata krama, etika, moral, sopan dan santun," kata Sugiyanto saat dihubungi, Senin malam, 4 November 2019.
Ia memperkirakan BK bakal memanggil William pada Senin pekan depan. Sebabnya, sebagian anggota BK mengikuti kunjungan kerja selama tiga hari mulai Kamis besok, 7 November 2018.
Dalam rapat hari ini, kata dia, BK belum bisa menyimpulkan dugaan adanya pelanggaran etika yang dilakukan William. Setelah ada kesimpulan, BK bakal langsung menyerahkan rekomendasi ke pimpinan DPRD.
"Nanti pimpinan yang memutuskan dan mengumumkan. Kami hanya memberikan rekomendasi," ucapnya. "Sekarang belum bisa diputuskan ada pelanggaran etika atau tidak. Nanti kami undang dulu William untuk mengklarifikasi laporan warga."

Alleged Ethical Violations, Honorary Agency Call William PSI
05 Nov 2019, 10:18 by Imam Hamdi, Martha Warta Silaban
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - The DKI Jakarta DPRD Honorary Body said it would summon members of the DKI PSI Faction William Aditya Sarana or William PSI to follow up on citizens' reports related to ethical violations committed by the youngest legislator.
"We have held a meeting with members, we will invite William to the decision," said Chairman of the Honorary Board or BK DPRD DKI Achmad Nawawi, Tuesday, November 5, 2019.
A resident named Sugiyanto reported William to the DPRD Council yesterday. The Chairman of the City's Non-Governmental Organization was Happy His Citizens considered that what William had done violated DKI Jakarta DPRD Regulation No. 1 of 2014 concerning the Standing Orders of the DKI Jakarta DPRD.
Sugiyanto, assessed the violations seen from the way William uploaded the awkward DKI budget proposals through social media. William uploaded the awkward APBD DKI budget such as the purchase of aibon glue which reached Rp. 82 billion at the West Jakarta Education Agency.
"I see that it seems that the alleged violation of the code of ethics in expressing opinions. Not paying attention to manners, ethics, morals, courtesy and courtesy," said Sugiyanto when contacted, Monday night, November 4, 2019.
He predicted BK would summon William on Monday next week. The reason is that some BK members took a three-day work visit starting on Thursday, November 7, 2018.
In today's meeting, he said, BK could not conclude that there were ethical violations committed by William. After there is a conclusion, BK will immediately submit recommendations to the leadership of the DPRD.
"Later the leaders decide and announce it. We only give recommendations," he said. "Now it has not been decided yet whether there are ethical violations or not. We will invite William to clarify the citizens' reports."
